TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OracleConnection : System.Data.Common.DbConnection, ICloneable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleConnection extends System.Data.Common.DbConnection implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OracleConnection Inherits DbConnection Implements ICloneable
public ref class OracleConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection, ICloneable
type OracleConnection = class inherit DbConnection interface ICloneable

summary.span: 表示一个到数据库的打开的连接。

span.span: Represents an open connection to a database.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型已弃用，将.NET Framework 的未来版本中删除。This type is deprecated and will be removed in a future version of the .NET Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Oracle 和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md)。For more information, see [Oracle and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/oracle-and-adonet.md). 对象表示的唯一连接到 Oracle 数据库。An object represents a unique connection to an Oracle database. 对于客户端/服务器数据库系统，它相当于网络连接到服务器。In the case of a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 创建的实例的应用程序对象可以设置要求所有直接和间接调用方具有足够权限的代码的声明性或命令性安全要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can set declarative or imperative security demands that require all direct and indirect callers to have adequate permission to the code. 使用创建安全请求对象。 creates security demands by using the object. 用户可以验证其代码使用有足够的权限对象。Users can verify that their code has adequate permissions by using the object. 用户和管理员还可以使用代码访问安全策略工具 (Caspol.exe) 来修改在计算机、 用户和企业级别的安全策略。Users and administrators can also use the Code Access Security Policy Tool (Caspol.exe) to modify security policy at the machine, user, and enterprise levels. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6)。For more information, see [Security](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9a9621d7-8883-4a4f-a874-65e8e09e20a6). > [!NOTE] > 与不同**连接**对象中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC）不支持属性。Unlike the **Connection** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 作为属性或连接字符串中设置连接超时值不起作用，并且返回的值始终为零。Setting a connection time-out either as a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支持属性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method. 如果对象超出范围，它保持打开状态。If the object goes out of scope, it remains open. 因此，应始终关闭对象通过调用或**Dispose**，或通过使用对象内`Using`语句。Therefore, you should always close objects by calling or **Dispose**, or by using the object within a `Using` statement. 否则，垃圾回收可能不会立即释放它们。Otherwise, the garbage collection might not free them immediately. 如果最大连接数达到连接数等待垃圾回收器删除时，此类延迟会导致错误。Such delays can cause errors if the maximum number of connections is reached while a number of connections are waiting to be deleted by the garbage collector. 与此相反，通过调用关闭连接更有效地使用本机资源增强可伸缩性并提高应用程序的整体性能。By contrast, closing the connections by calling uses native resources more efficiently, enhancing scalability and improving overall application performance. 若要确保始终关闭连接，请打开的内部连接`Using`块。To ensure that connections are always closed, open the connection inside of a `Using` block. > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高性能应用程序，通常需要使用连接池。To deploy high-performance applications, you often need to use connection pooling. 但是，当为 Oracle 使用.NET Framework 数据提供程序，您确实需要启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理。However, when you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle, you do not need to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 打开，并设置为属性。The is opened and set as the property. 该示例然后调用，并关闭连接。The example then calls , and closes the connection. 若要实现此目的，传递连接字符串和一个 SQL INSERT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbTransaction BeginDbTransaction(valuetype System.Data.IsolationLevel isolationLevel) cil managed

summary.span: 在数据库中开始一个事务。

span.span: Begins a transaction at the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction BeginTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 在数据库中开始一个事务。

span.span: Begins a transaction at the database.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提交或回滚事务，必须显式使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 事务管理模型，应避免使用其他事务管理模型，如所提供的数据库。To ensure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the database. > [!NOTE] > 如果不指定隔离级别，使用默认隔离级别。If you do not specify an isolation level, the default isolation level is used. 若要指定隔离级别，其中方法，请使用重载。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Parallel transactions are not supported.

summary.span: 使用指定的 值在数据库中开始一个事务。

span.span: Begins a transaction at the database with the specified value.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提交或回滚事务，必须显式使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle 事务管理模型，应避免使用其他事务管理模型，如所提供的数据库。To ensure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the database. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.BeginTransaction/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The name of the database to use instead of the current database.

summary.span: 更改已打开的 的当前数据库。

span.span: Changes the current database for an open .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数必须包含有效的数据库名称，并且不能包含 null 值、 空字符串 ("")，或只有空白字符的字符串。The `value` parameter must contain a valid database name, and cannot contain a null value, an empty string (""), or a string with only blank characters. > [!NOTE] > 与不同**连接**对象中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC）不支持属性。Unlike the **Connection** object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 作为属性或连接字符串中设置连接超时值不起作用，并且返回的值始终为零。Setting a connection time-out either as a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支持属性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method.

span.span: The database name is not valid.
The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ClearAllPools() cil managed

summary.span: 清空连接池。

span.span: Empties the connection pool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重置 （或清空） 连接池。 resets (or empties) the connection pool. 如果连接中正在使用的在调用时，它们被适当标记并且将被丢弃时对其调用。If connections are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded when is called on them.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ClearPool(class System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection connection) cil managed
Public Shared Sub ClearPool (connection As OracleConnection)

span.span: The to be cleared from the pool.

summary.span: 清空与指定连接关联的连接池。

span.span: Empties the connection pool associated with the specified connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将清除与关联的连接池`connection`。 method clears the connection pool that is associated with `connection`. 如果与其他连接相关联`connection`是用在调用时，它们被适当标记并且将被丢弃时对其调用。If additional connections associated with `connection` are in use at the time of the call, they are marked appropriately and are discarded when is called on them.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭与数据库之间的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回滚所有挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后释放到连接池连接，或如果禁用连接池时关闭连接。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 应用程序可以调用多次而不会生成异常。An application can call more than once without generating an exception. > [!NOTE] > Oracle 中使用.NET Framework 数据提供程序时，您不需要启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle, you do not need to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用上即，或在任何其他托管的对象`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call on a , a , or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开 Oracle 数据库的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open an Oracle database.

value.span: 包含设置（如服务器名称等）的 Oracle 连接字符串需要建立初始连接。

span.span: The Oracle connection string that includes settings, such as the server name, needed to establish the initial connection.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format:
## Remarks 仅当连接关闭时，才可以设置。The can be set only when the connection is closed. 可以使用属性，以连接到数据库。You can use the property to connect to a database. 下面的示例说明了典型的连接字符串。The following example illustrates a typical connection string. ``` "Data Source=Oracle8i;Integrated Security=yes" ``` 许多字符串中指定的设置具有相应的只读属性 (例如， `Data Source=MyServer`，它对应于属性)。Many of the settings specified in the string have corresponding read-only properties (for example, `Data Source=MyServer`, which corresponds to the property). 当连接字符串设置时，所有这些属性会更新，除非检测到错误，在这种情况下更新任何属性。When the connection string is set, all of these properties are updated, unless an error is detected, in which case none of the properties are updated. 属性只返回默认设置或在指定的那些设置。 properties return only default settings or those settings specified in the . 重置关闭的连接将重置所有连接字符串值 （和相关的属性），包括密码。Resetting the on a closed connection resets all connection string values (and related properties), including the password. 在设置之后立即分析连接字符串。The connection string is parsed immediately after being set. 如果如分析时发现错误在语法中，运行时异常，生成。If parsing reveals errors in syntax, a run-time exception, such as , is generated. 仅当尝试打开连接时，可以发现其他错误。Other errors can be found only when an attempt is made to open the connection. 连接字符串的基本格式是一系列由分号分隔的关键字/值对。The basic format of a connection string is a series of keyword/value pairs separated by semicolons. 每个关键字和它的值之间用等号 (=) 连接。The equal sign (=) connects each keyword and its value. 若要包含的值包含分号、 单引号字符或双引号字符，则该值必须括在双引号内。To include values that contain a semicolon, single-quote character, or double-quote character, the value must be enclosed in double quotes. 如果值包含分号和双引号字符，则该值可以括在单引号中。If the value contains both a semicolon and a double-quote character, the value can be enclosed in single quotes. 一个单引号还是双引号字符开头的值的情况下很有用。The single quote is also useful if the value begins with a double-quote character. 相反，如果该值以使用一个单引号，则可以使用双引号。Conversely, the double quote can be used if the value begins with a single quote. 如果值包含单引号和双引号字符，用于将值括起来的引号必须成对出现每次它的值中出现时。If the value contains both single-quote and double-quote characters, the quote character used to enclose the value must be doubled each time it occurs within the value. 若要包含前导或尾随空格的字符串值，则该值必须括在单引号或双引号引起来。To include preceding or trailing spaces in the string value, the value must be enclosed in either single quotes or double quotes. 周围的整数、 布尔值或枚举的值的任何前导或尾随空格将被忽略，即使用引号括起来。Any leading or trailing spaces around integer, Boolean, or enumerated values are ignored, even if enclosed in quotes. 但是，会保留空格的字符串字面常数关键字或值中。However, spaces within a string literal keyword or value are preserved. 而不使用分隔符，除非引号字符是在值的第一个或最后一个字符，例如，可能的连接字符串中使用单引号或双引号`Data Source= my'Server`或`Data Source= my"Server`。Single or double quotes may be used within a connection string without using delimiters unless a quote character is the first or last character in the value, for example, `Data Source= my'Server` or `Data Source= my"Server`. 若要在关键字或值中包含等号 （=），它的前面必须通过另一个等号。To include an equal sign (=) in a keyword or value, it must be preceded by another equal sign. 例如，在假设的连接字符串For example, in the hypothetical connection string ``` "key==word=value" ``` 关键字是"键 = word"，值为"value"。the keyword is "key=word" and the value is "value". 如果关键字/值对中的特定关键字的连接字符串中出现多次，则设置的值中使用最后一个匹配项。If a specific keyword in a keyword/value pair occurs more than once in a connection string, the last occurrence is used in the value set. 关键字是不区分大小写。Keywords are case insensitive. 下表列出了中的值的有效名称。The following table lists the valid names for values within the . |nameName|默认Default|描述Description| |----------|-------------|-----------------| |“数据源”Data Source

- 或 --or-

服务器Server||要连接到的 Oracle 实例的名称或网络地址。The name or network address of the instance of Oracle to which to connect.| |Integrated SecurityIntegrated Security|false'false'|该连接是否或不是安全的连接。Whether the connection is to be a secure connection or not.

可识别的值为`true`（强烈推荐）， `false`， `yes`，和`no`。Recognized values are `true` (strongly recommended), `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| |PasswordPassword||记录的 Oracle 帐户的密码。The password for the Oracle account logging on. 若要维护高级别的安全性，强烈建议您改为使用集成安全性关键字。To maintain a high level of security, we strongly recommend that you use the Integrated Security keyword instead.| |Persist Security InfoPersist Security Info|false'false'|如果设置为`false`或`no`（强烈推荐），如密码的安全敏感信息不返回作为连接的一部分，如果连接是打开的或者一直处于一种开放。When set to `false` or `no` (strongly recommended), security-sensitive information such as the password is not returned as part of the connection if the connection is open or has ever been in an open . 重置连接字符串将重置所有连接字符串值，包括密码。Resetting the connection string resets all connection string values, including the password.

已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| |UnicodeUnicode|false'false'|指定适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序是否使用 UTF16 模式 API 调用。Specifies whether the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle uses UTF16 mode API calls. 此关键字将被忽略，除非使用 Oracle9i 客户端软件。This keyword is ignored except when using Oracle9i client software.| |User IDUser ID||Oracle 登录帐户。The Oracle login account. 若要维护高级别的安全性，强烈建议您改为使用集成安全性关键字。To maintain a high level of security, we strongly recommend that you use the Integrated Security keyword instead.| 下表列出了连接池内的值的有效名称。The following table lists the valid names for connection pooling values within the . |nameName|默认Default|描述Description| |----------|-------------|-----------------| |连接生存期Connection Lifetime|00|连接返回到池中后，创建时间将与当前时间进行比较，如果时间跨度（秒）超过 `Connection Lifetime` 指定的值，该连接将被破坏。When a connection is returned to the pool, its creation time is compared with the current time, and the connection is destroyed if that time span (in seconds) exceeds the value specified by `Connection Lifetime`. 在聚集配置中可以使用它来强制在运行服务器和刚联机的服务器之间达到负载平衡。This is useful in clustered configurations to force load balancing between a running server and a server just brought online.

零值会导致池的连接具有最大连接超时。A value of zero causes pooled connections to have the maximum connection time-out.| |EnlistEnlist|'true''true'|当`true`或`yes`，池进程会自动登记在创建线程的当前事务上下文中的连接。When `true` or `yes`, the pooler automatically enlists the connection in the creation thread's current transaction context.

已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| |Max Pool SizeMax Pool Size|100100|池中允许的最大连接数。The maximum number of connections allowed in the pool. 设置`Max Pool Size`的值可能会影响性能。Setting the `Max Pool Size` value of the can affect performance. 如果您计划创建并主动使用超过 100 个连接，则应增加`Max Pool Size`近似于应用程序的稳定状态连接使用情况的值。If you plan to create and actively use more than 100 connections, you should increase `Max Pool Size` to a value that approximates the steady-state connection usage for the application.| |Min Pool SizeMin Pool Size|00|连接池中允许的最小数目。The minimum number of connections allowed in the pool.| |PoolingPooling|'true''true'|当`true`或`yes`，则对象绘制从相应的池中，或如有必要，被创建并添加到相应的池中。When `true` or `yes`, the object is drawn from the appropriate pool, or if necessary, is created and added to the appropriate pool.

已识别的值为 `true`、`false`、`yes` 和 `no`。Recognized values are `true`, `false`, `yes`, and `no`.| 在设置关键字或连接池需要一个布尔值的值时，您可以使用是而不是 'true'，和 no 而不是 'false'。When setting keyword or connection pooling values that require a Boolean value, you can use 'yes' instead of 'true', and 'no' instead of 'false'. 整数值表示为字符串。Integer values are represented as strings. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和连接字符串中设置的某些属性。The following example creates an and sets some of its properties in the connection string. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.DataSource/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ConnectionTimeout As Integer
public: virtual property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取在建立连接时终止尝试并生成错误之前所等待的时间。

span.span: Gets the time to wait to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待连接打开所需的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
The default value is 15 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过使用连接等待的时间量设置为超时`Connect Timeout`或`Connection Timeout`连接字符串中的关键字。You can set the amount of time a connection waits to time out by using the `Connect Timeout` or `Connection Timeout` keywords in the connection string. 值为 0 表示没有限制，并应避免在因为连接尝试将无限期等待。A value of 0 indicates no limit, and should be avoided in a because an attempt to connect waits indefinitely. > [!NOTE] > 与不同`Connection`中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的对象不支持属性。Unlike the `Connection` object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 设置连接超时值的属性或连接字符串中不起作用，并且返回的值始终为零。Setting a connection time-out either with a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支持属性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method.

span.span: The value specified is less than 0.

Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Database As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Database { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used after a connection is opened.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会动态更新。The property updates dynamically. 如果您更改当前数据库使用 SQL 语句或方法发送一条信息性消息和自动更新的属性。If you change the current database using a SQL statement or the method, an informational message is sent and the property is updated automatically. > [!NOTE] > 与不同`Connection`中的其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序 （SQL Server、 OLE DB 和 ODBC） 的对象不支持属性。Unlike the `Connection` object in the other .NET Framework data providers (SQL Server, OLE DB, and ODBC), does not support a property. 设置连接超时值的属性或连接字符串中不起作用，并且返回的值始终为零。Setting a connection time-out either with a property or in the connection string has no effect, and the value returned is always zero. 也不支持属性或方法。 also does not support a property or a method.

public: virtual property System::String ^ DataSource { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取要连接的 Oracle 服务器的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the Oracle server to which to connect.

value.span: 要连接的 Oracle 服务器的名称。

span.span: The name of the Oracle server to which to connect.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
.method public hidebysig instance void EnlistDistributedTransaction(class System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction distributedTransaction) cil managed

param.name: distributedTransaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**实现此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 你可以继续在现有使用分布式的事务中登记You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the 如果禁用自动登记，方法。 method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在现有分布式事务中登记可以确保，提交或回滚事务，如果数据源的代码所做的修改也提交或回滚。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction ensures that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 如果返回的异常已经启动了事务使用。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 但是，如果该事务是在数据源启动的本地事务 (例如，通过显式执行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 语句使用对象)，回滚本地事务，并在现有登记作为请求的分布式的事务。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 不会收到通知，本地事务已回滚，并且负责不管理任何本地事务使用。You will not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the 若要在分布式事务中登记的方法。 method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，使用该**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**对象。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它还具有略有不同的语义： 后显式事务上登记连接，不能取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

summary.span: 返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema () As DataTable

summary.span: 返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .
A that contains schema information.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String) As DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

summary.span: 通过使用架构名称的指定字符串，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用查询区分大小写。Queries using are case sensitive. 由于 Oracle 的处理方式的情况下当首次创建架构，这可能导致意外的结果。Because of Oracle's treatment of cases when a schema is first created, this can lead to unexpected results. 如果创建不带引号的架构`,`Oracle 以大写形式存储的对象名称。If the schema was created without quotes`,` Oracle stores the object name in upper case. 如果带引号创建架构时，Oracle 将对象名称存储在提供的大小写。If the schema was created with quotes, Oracle stores the object name in the casing provided. 例如，假设您创建一个名为 MyTable，使用以下两个语句中的一个表：For example, suppose that you create a table called MyTable, using one of the following two statements: `CREATE TABLE MyTable ...` `CREATE TABLE "MyTable" ...` 若要检索有关通过此表的信息**GetSchema**第一种方法，您将不得不在作为参数传递"MYTABLE"。To retrieve information about this table via the **GetSchema** method in the first case, you would have to pass "MYTABLE" in as an argument. 在第二种情况下，您必须作为参数传入"MyTable"。In the second case, you would have to pass "MyTable" in as an argument.

span.span: is specified as null.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 请求的架构的一组限制值。

span.span: A set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 通过使用指定字符串作为架构名称，指定字符串数组作为限制值，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `restrictionValues`参数可以提供 n 深度的值指定的特定集合的限制集合。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply n depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要将值设置给定的限制，并且未设置其他限制的值，需要将前面的限制，则为 null，然后将放在你想要为指定值的限制为适当的值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you need to set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 此示例是"表"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合具有 3 个限制： 数据库、 所有者和表名称;并且想要得到仅与"Carl"的所有者关联的表，则你需要传入 （至少） 以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has 3 restrictions: database, owner, and table name; and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl", then you would need to pass in the following values (at a minimum): null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是不同于传入的参数值为空字符串。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different than passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. 使用查询区分大小写。Queries using are case sensitive. 由于 Oracle 的处理方式的情况下当首次创建架构，这可能导致意外的结果。Because of Oracle's treatment of cases when a schema is first created, this can lead to unexpected results. 如果创建不带引号的架构`,`Oracle 以大写形式存储的对象名称。If the schema was created without quotes`,` Oracle stores the object name in upper case. 如果带引号创建架构时，Oracle 将对象名称存储在提供的大小写。If the schema was created with quotes, Oracle stores the object name in the casing provided. 例如，假设您创建一个名为 MyTable，使用以下两个语句中的一个表：For example, suppose that you create a table called MyTable, using one of the following two statements: `CREATE TABLE MyTable ...` `CREATE TABLE "MyTable" ...` 若要检索有关通过此表的信息**GetSchema**第一种方法，您将不得不在作为参数传递"MYTABLE"。To retrieve information about this table via the **GetSchema** method in the first case, you would have to pass "MYTABLE" in as an argument. 在第二种情况下，您必须作为参数传入"MyTable"。In the second case, you would have to pass "MyTable" in as an argument.

span.span: is specified as null.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event InfoMessage As OracleInfoMessageEventHandler

summary.span: 当 Oracle 发送警告或信息性消息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when Oracle sends a warning or an informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适用于 Oracle 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序使用 Oracle 调用接口 (OCI)，每当数据提供程序接收成功的信息消息，因为生成事件。Because the .NET Framework Data Provider for Oracle uses the Oracle Call Interface (OCI), whenever the data provider receives a Success With Info message, an event is generated. 示例将创建包含语法错误的存储的过程。An example would be creating a stored procedure that contains a syntax error. 对调用方法会成功。The call to the method would succeed. 但是会生成事件，通知您语法错误。However an event would be generated informing you of the syntax error. 想要处理警告或信息性消息，由服务器发送客户端应创建委托来侦听此事件。Clients who want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 指定的属性设置打开一个到数据库的连接。

span.span: Opens a connection to a database with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制从连接池中的打开的连接，如果有可用。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否则，它在建立与数据库的新连接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the database. > [!NOTE] > 如果超出范围，它表示该连接不会不会自动关闭。If the goes out of scope, the connection it represents does not close automatically. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling .

span.span: The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含客户端所连接到的服务器的版本的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string containing the version of the server to which the client is connected.
The version of the connected server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的 Oracle 版本格式。The property is in Oracle version format. 例如，对于 Oracle8 版本的格式是窗体中的字符串"8.1.7.0.0 Oracle8 发布 8.1.7.0.0-生产环境。"For example, the format for an Oracle8 release is a string in the form "8.1.7.0.0 Oracle8 Release 8.1.7.0.0 - Production." ## Examples 下面的示例创建并显示它的一些只读属性。The following example creates an and displays some of its read-only properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.ServerVersion/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The connection is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState

summary.span: 获取连接的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the connection.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许的状态更改是：The allowed state changes are: - 从`Closed`到`Open`，并使用`Open`方法的对象。From `Closed` to `Open`, using the `Open` method of the object. - 从`Open`到`Closed`，并使用方法的对象。From `Open` to `Closed`, using the method of the object. ## Examples 下面的示例创建派生类的实例，设置其，并显示其。The following example creates an instance of a derived class, , sets its , and displays its . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OracleConnection.State#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.State/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OracleConnection.State#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OracleConnection.State/VB/source.vb#1)]

An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成事务后，必须显式提交或回滚该事务通过或方法。Once the transaction has completed, you must explicitly commit or roll back the transaction by using the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
